Content.Text:
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>! You're here? You could have said
something to me!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. It means a lot to me that you
would say that.
<PAGE>
I've reached another level in my
training, and it made me want to play.
I got totally wrapped up in it!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You liked my performance that much, did
you?
<PAGE>
I love to play, so your praise makes me
so happy!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You could tell by watching me, could
you? That's a little embarrassing!
<PAGE>
What did you think of me while I was
playing? Please tell me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
P-Please, <MYNAME>! Don't make fun of me!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You can't just go around calling people
c-c-cute like that!
<PAGE>
I've never been told that by a man
before...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There's no need to apologize. I'm not
saying I didn't like it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>In fact, I was really happy to hear you
say that I looked cute, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm just a little embarrassed. I don't
really know how to respond.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's been a while since I felt quite so
excited as this.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to listen to me play again?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I'll play for you! You only
need to ask, any time.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. I'm honored to have been
praised like that.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to listen to me play again?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I'll play for you! You only
need to ask, any time.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for coming to see me today.
Please take care on your way home.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Cool, he said.
<PAGE>
Knowing that <MYNAME> thinks of me like
that makes me feel... a little sad. I
wonder why?
